Debt.title: Debt
Debt.description: Represents a debt record, including details about the debtor, amount, and associated payments and images.

debtorName.description: The denormalized name of the debtor for easy display.

concept.description: A brief description of what the debt is for.

description.description: An optional, more detailed description of the debt.

amount.description: The total amount of the debt.

type.description: The type of debt: 'iou' (I owe you) or 'uome' (you owe me).

createdAt.description: The date when the debt was created.

dueDate.description: The optional due date for the debt.

items.description: An optional list of items detailing the composition of the debt.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this debt (for private debts or to identify the creator of a shared debt).

userOneId.description: The UID of the first user in a shared debt, sorted lexicographically.

userTwoId.description: The UID of the second user in a shared debt, sorted lexicographically.

participants.description: An array containing the UIDs of both users involved in a shared debt, for efficient querying.

isShared.description: Flag to identify if the debt is shared between two users.

isSettled.description: Flag to know if a debt was part of a settlement

settlementId.description: Which settlement it was part of

status.description: The approval status of a shared debt.

approvedBy.description: List of user UIDs who have approved the debt.

rejectedBy.description: The UID of the user who rejected the debt.

rejectionReason.description: The reason why the debt was rejected.

deletionStatus.description: The consensus deletion status of a shared debt.

deletionRequestedBy.description: The UID of the user who requested the deletion.

originalDebtor.description: Name of the person who originally owed the money in a 3-way split, for context when the creator is a third party.

Item.title: Item
Item.description: Represents a single item within a debt, such as a product or a specific concept with its own value.

name.description: The name of the product or concept.

value.description: The cost of this specific item.

Payment.title: Payment
Payment.description: Represents a payment made towards a debt.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Payment entity.

date.description: The date when the payment was made.

receiptUrl.description: URL of the payment receipt image.

Debtor.title: Debtor
Debtor.description: Represents the person or entity that owes the debt.

contact.description: Contact information for the debtor (e.g., phone number, email address).

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this debtor.

paymentMethod.description: The preferred payment method for the debtor.

paymentInfo.description: Details for the payment method, like an account number.

isAppUser.description: Whether the contact is linked to an app user account.

appUserId.description: The Firebase UID of the linked app user.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a user-defined category for debts.

icon.description: The name of the lucide-react icon for the category.

color.description: The tailwind color class for the category (e.g., 'bg-blue-500').

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this category.

Settlement.title: Settlement
Settlement.description: Represents a settlement event where debts between a user and a debtor are crossed.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Settlement event.

debtorId.description: The ID of the debtor involved in the settlement.

date.description: The date when the settlement occurred.

amountSettled.description: The total amount that was mutually cancelled out.

newDebtId.description: The ID of the new debt created for the remaining balance, if any.

userId.description: The ID of the user who performed the settlement.

ActivityLog.title: Activity Log
ActivityLog.description: Records an event related to a shared debt.

debtId.description: The ID of the shared debt this log refers to.

userId.description: The ID of the user who performed the action.

userName.description: The denormalized name of the user for display.

userPhotoUrl.description: The denormalized photo URL of the user.

message.description: A human-readable message describing the activity.

participants.description: An array containing the UIDs of both users involved in the debt for querying.

DebtUserMetadata.title: Debt User Metadata
DebtUserMetadata.description: Stores user-specific metadata for a debt, like a personal category.

categoryId.description: The ID of the category assigned by the user.

collections.description: Stores information about the people or entities who owe money.
Stores the individual private debt records for a user.
Stores debt records shared between two users.
Stores the history of debt settlement events.
Stores activity logs for shared debts.
Stores user-specific metadata for debts, such as personal categories.
